titles.title: Disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the Closing of a Public Alley and Establishment of an Easement in Square 253, S.O. 88-107, Act of 1994.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 3/24/1995--Introduced. Disapproves the Act approved by the District of Columbia Council on February 7, 1995, providing for the Closing of a Public Alley and Establishment of an Easement in Square 253, S.O. 88-107.
